  • API References

Reference

Top-level API for MIMS-unit

Function to compute MIMS-unit value.

mims_unit()

Compute activity counts using [citation] algorithm

File IO

Functions for importing or exporting data for various data formats.

import_actigraph_count() import_actigraph_count_vm()

Import and convert Actigraph count csv files and load into data frame as in mhealth format.

import_actigraph_meta()

parse actigraph csv header to get related version and sampling rate information

import_actigraph_raw()

Import and convert Actigraph raw csv files and load into data frame as in mhealth format.

import_activpal_raw()

Import ActivPal Raw data files and load into dataframe as mhealth format.

import_biobank_enmo()

Import and convert biobank epoch csv files and load into data frame as in mhealth format.

export_to_actilife()

Export accelerometer data in Actilife RAW CSV format

Signal Filtering

Functions to filter multi-channel accelerometer signal.

iir()

Apply IIR filter to the signal

bessel()

Apply Bessel lowpass filter to the signal

remove_average()

Remove constant component of the signal

bandlimited_interp()

Apply a bandlimited interpolation filter to the signal to change the sampling rate

Signal extrapolation

Functions to extrapolate multi-channel accelerometer signal.

interpolate_signal()

Interpolate the missing points and unify sampling interval for the input sensor data

extrapolate.data.frame() extrapolate()

Apply extrapolate algorithm to a single stream of data.

extrapolate_rate()

Get extrapolation rate.

Signal aggregation

Functions to aggregate over epochs of multi-channel accelerometer signal.

aggregate_for_mims()

Aggregate over epoch to get numerically integrated values.

aggregate_for_orientation()

Aggregate over epoch to get estimated accelerometer orientation.

compute_orientation()

Calculate orientation of a sensor in (X,Y,Z degrees) for each axis

sum_up()

Sum of multi-channel signal.

vector_magnitude()

Vector magnitude of multi-channel signal.

Util functions

Utility functions.

sampling_rate()

Get sensor data's sampling rate from the time difference of adjacent samples

crop_grange()

Crop grange for sensor data

make_sensor_data()

make sensor data given range and sampling rate and old sensor data

Contents

  • Top-level API for MIMS-unit
  • File IO
  • Signal Filtering
  • Signal extrapolation
  • Signal aggregation
